Summary: saw a colorful light in the sky (not a plane)
divs: Sighting Detailsi decided late on friday night december 14,2001, to sit outside and look at thestars because, there were lots of falling stars earlier so i wanted to gaze. isat where it was clear and u can see a ways from my yard. i am on a hill.i couldsee a radio tower in the distance. a bright white light caugt my eye just abovethe radio tower, so i started watching it. it stayed in the same place for awhile, but it was bobbing up and down and side to side.the radio tower flashesin sequence a red light. the white light which looked like a star startedflashing red too like it was copying the radio light.and then changed differentcolors like a strobe light but in a rainbow of colors.it moved all around theradio light and dimmed out and back on again. it got to the side and shot up andthen back down real quick like a flash. then it shot up strait up anddissapeared. this experience lasted at least 2 and a half hours.
trends: there have been no other sightings in mconnells\chester area
This sighting has never been favorited.
